text: Mitrella tenebrosa is a species of sea snail in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. Its specific name tenebrosa refers to its dark colour.Rolán E. 2005. Columbellidae (Gastropoda, Neogastropoda) of the gulf of Guinea with the description of eight new species. Iberus 23(2): 119–156 ==Distribution and habitat== The species is endemic São Tomé Island where it may occur at depths greater than 15–20 m. ==References== tenebrosa Category:Endemic fauna of São Tomé Island Category:Invertebrates of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Gastropods described in 2005
title: Mitrella tenebrosa
